Secure Dragon LLC. was registered in October of 2010 and has been selling quality VPSs since the beginning. We've grown over the years and currently offer services in Florida, Colorado, and Oregon. In 2012 we received our own IPs from ARIN so we manage all of our own IP space without worrying about price changes as the pool shrinks. You can read more about us here.

We currently offer Budget OpenVZ and KVM plans in our Tampa, FL and Denver, CO locations with DDOS Protected OpenVZ plans in our Portland, OR location. Our plans range from Ultra Low End Boxes (ULEBs) with 32MB of RAM to larger boxes with 4GB of RAM.
